name: NSDateComponents
desc: An object that specifies a date or time in terms of calendar units that bridges to DateComponents; use NSDateComponents when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

items.name: var calendar: Calendar?
items.desc: The calendar used to interpret the date components.

items.name: var timeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: The time zone used to interpret the date components.

items.name: var isValidDate: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current combination of properties represents a date which exists in the current calendar.

items.name: func isValidDate(in: Calendar) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current combination of properties represents a date which exists in the specified calendar.

items.name: var date: Date?
items.desc: The date calculated from the current components using the stored calendar.

items.name: var era: Int
items.desc: The number of eras.

items.name: var year: Int
items.desc: The number of years.

items.name: var yearForWeekOfYear: Int
items.desc: The ISO 8601 week-numbering year.

items.name: var quarter: Int
items.desc: The number of quarters.

items.name: var month: Int
items.desc: The number of months.

items.name: var isLeapMonth: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the month is a leap month.

items.name: var weekday: Int
items.desc: The number of the weekdays.

items.name: var weekdayOrdinal: Int
items.desc: The ordinal number of weekdays.

items.name: var weekOfMonth: Int
items.desc: The week number of the months.

items.name: var weekOfYear: Int
items.desc: The ISO 8601 week date of the year.

items.name: var day: Int
items.desc: The number of days.

items.name: var hour: Int
items.desc: The number of hour units for the receiver.

items.name: var minute: Int
items.desc: The number of minute units for the receiver.

items.name: var second: Int
items.desc: The number of second units for the receiver.

items.name: var nanosecond: Int
items.desc: The number of nanosecond units for the receiver.

items.name: func value(forComponent: NSCalendar.Unit) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the value for a given calendar unit.

items.name: func setValue(Int, forComponent: NSCalendar.Unit)
items.desc: Sets a value for a given calendar unit.

items.name: struct NSCalendar.Unit
items.desc: Calendrical units such as year, month, day and hour.
